Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. This exceptional item boasts a range of features that make it stand out from the rest. Considering its quality and functionality, I believe it's worth more than its face value of $120. I am offering it to you for $150, which includes a special discount tailored for our valued customers like you. Don't miss out on this opportunity to enhance your experience with our top-tier product. Let me know if you have any questions or need further details. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $150. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $150
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $100
